DataElement.preferredName: Hospital Specific Distant Surgery Distance Surgery Number Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Records the surgical removal of distant lymph nodes or other tissue(s)/organ(s) beyond the primary site performed at this facility as a part of first course of treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Records the surgical removal of distant lymph nodes or other tissue(s)/organ(s) beyond the primary site at this facility.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.:Specified; clearly and explicitly stated.

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.

Property.preferredDefinition: Far apart in space, time, or relevance.:A specialty in which manual or operative procedures are used in the treatment of disease, injuries, or deformities.

Concepts.definition: Far apart in space from a point of origin on the body.
The branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
